Message:
A peaceful life.
Those words described
me and my big sis perfectly.

She and I lived alone together
deep in the mountains,
far away from the nearest
human settlement.

We didn’t want to live rustic—
it was our only choice.

Witches weren’t allowed to
live in the settlement, after all.

Whenever we’d go down
to the settlement to sell
the animals we’d trapped,
I remember everybody
there’d often glare at us.

But, even if they point at us
or call us every name in the book,
it’s all just water off
a duck’s back to me.
I have my big sis with me, after all.

She does yell at me sometimes,
but she’s still my kind,
beautiful sister who’s
just like a mother to me.

Big Sis is my only family.
As long as I have her,
I don’t need anythin’ else.
She was all I needed, and yet...
